# About This Data Science Project

This site demonstrates data analysis on Iris dataset.

## Iris Dataset Analysis

The Iris dataset is a popular and fundamental dataset in ML and statistics.

```{python}
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import pandas as pd
import seaborn as sns
from sklearn.datasets import load_iris

# Load the Iris dataset
iris = load_iris()
iris_df = pd.DataFrame(data=iris.data, columns=iris.feature_names)
iris_df['species'] = iris.target
iris_df['species'] = iris_df['species'].map({0: 'setosa', 1: 'versicolor', 2: 'virginica'})

# Calculate correlation matrix
correlation_matrix = iris_df.iloc[:, :-1].corr()

# Create correlation heatmap
plt.figure(figsize=(10, 8))
sns.heatmap(correlation_matrix, annot=True, cmap='coolwarm', center=0,
            square=True, fmt='.3f', cbar_kws={"shrink": .8})
plt.title('Iris Dataset - Feature Correlation Matrix', fontsize=16, fontweight='bold')
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()
```

This correlation analysis reveals the relationships between different iris flower measurements, helping us understand which features are most closely related.
